mapper.sql: smei.month_end_inventory_id, smei.storage_id, smei.material_id, smei.box_number, smei.total, smei.`status`, smei.remark, smei.organization_id, smei.create_user_id, smei.create_time, smei.modified_user_id, smei.modified_time, smei.is_delete
mapper.select:
select ,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name ,sw.warehouse_name,swa.warehouse_area_name,ss.storage_name,sm.material_code,sm.material_desc, ssi.quantity,spm.product_model_name,sss.supplier_name,so.contract_code FROM storage_month_end_inventory smei LEFT JOIN mes_package_manager mpm ON mpm.bar_code = smei.material_barcode_code LEFT JOIN smt_work_order swo ON swo.work_order_id = mpm.work_order_id LEFT JOIN smt_order so ON so.order_id = swo.order_id left join smt_supplier sss ON sss.supplier_id = so.supplier_id
LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON smei.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON smei.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON smei.organization_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_storage_inventory ssi ON ssi.storage_id = smei.storage_id and ssi.material_id = smei.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_storage ss on smei.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse sw on sw.warehouse_id = ss.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_warehouse_area swa on swa.warehouse_area_id = ss.warehouse_area_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_material sm on sm.material_id = smei.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_tab bt on bt.material_id = ssi.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm on spm.product_model_id = bt.product_model_id
and sw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and saw.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and spm.productModelName like CONCAT('%', #{productModelName}, '%')
and smei.create_time like CONCAT(#{month}, '%')
